channel.title: What should i do?
channel.description:
I am the only one that been commited to destorying scamming with any means possible.
But I am now destroyed.
Genodemon is advising that i give up. I lack the funding to fight him. Few here understand raw's history it seems. Your all new to cheating. Unfornantly so am i and now i am learning that my positions will lead to my death.
I mean like all you "higher-ups" roll over at the sight of money.
1. E-fak taking dontations from raw. 2. Even your loved Kaitneiks was probably bought out sadly that is the only conclusion for him re-directing to raw. 3. Mebe you forget kait sold autorune and it got in the hands of a raw(APD at the time).
Do you forget all the scamming that happened before raw got ar? After, the keylogging and canclled auths that happened when ar was around. The ar auth process sent the user, pass of the rs char and your ar auth! Then the 2 years of ar2 "coming" multiple pre-auths sales?
Hes back 180 days after the last scam, the time set by paypal so he can now scam again!

item.title: What should i do?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

The last promise of autorune that RaW sold was called autorune 2 and it was just going to be another client edit such as aryan. Of course since RaW is a scammer he never came through with it and just disappeared with all of the poor noob’s money.

Read full topic

item.title: What should i do?
item.dc:creator: @semaphore semaphore
item.description:
@semaphore wrote:

[quote=“ruler, post:46, topic:16655”]Kaitnieks always passed down things to RaW. Either it be his community or his bots. Many ppl suspect things but most are scard to voice bc of kaitnieks rep.

eFak josh in #sales on DaNET:
+Joshy : Raw is paying kaitnieks evo cow and sean all to make AR2
+Joshy : I kid you not
+Joshy : Ive been in convos

RaW is friends with all the old higher ups. They respect each other.[/quote]

If they are working together on an ‘AR2’ it would prove at least 1 of the following points:

[ul][li]1. They have so much time but so little understanding that they could dedicate the effort necessary to such a painful project.[/li]
[li]2. They do not understand precisely what is required to build a system based on the same concept of packet manipulation that AR was based upon.[/li]
[li]3. They enjoy failing in different ways.[/li][/ul]

All attempts at humor aside, if they are working on some form of autorune, I would have to assume that they either have some revolutionary way of knowing the packet protocol when an update comes or they are planning on building an effective bot system using bytecode manipulation.

I would admire and pity them if they were trying to go the same route as autorune. I would admire their audacity, I would pity their complete idiocy. Following through with such a project would be possible… only insomuch as it is possible to dig a canal with a plastic spoon.

Read full topic

item.title: What should i do?
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

[quote=“Algas, post:51, topic:16655”]Kaitnieks had to close down kaitnieks.com. We all admins there saw the letters he received from andrew gowner personally. And Kaitnieks was making pretty decent amount of money by google ads at the time. Thats why kaitnieks.coms’ price was so high.

But please. Raw is just riding with the AutoRune. There will never be AR2 from raw unless he buys it. How many times have ar2 been releasing in a 1 week? And raw has his own little circle. He has his own people that he trusts and those guys receives something from raw.[/quote]
ya who could afford it? (RaW)
Who got the redirection? (RaW)

As for the letters, this must be something new, bc i have never heard anyone that has recieved a letter directly from andrew gowner. and i know ppl who get them daily from jagex lawyers.

item.title: What should i do?
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

[quote=“Krichevskoy, post:45, topic:16655”][quote author=ruler link=topic=24888.msg310414#msg310414 date=1160713035]
mopar the admins of the community before you were corrupt but to different degrees. everyone has a price.
[/quote]

Before DoS warz became the cool way of dealing with rival communities, scams were the standard. Eveyone did it - cracking admin accounts, stealing characters, releasing keylogged bots, registering 10k accounts with a forumfucker script…you must understand how immature everyone was when RSC cheating hit its last boom (with version 201).

In the case of Josh: if you were in with TARC, you were safe and probably got stuff for free (if you were really top-level - like Alex, whose forum name I can’t remember). Anyone else got fucked regularly.
e.g., “Oh, I’m sorry, the database dropped the accounts table…again…but mysteriously preserved the free permanent accounts that I give out to friends.”

As far as why people trusted him, I think it was mostly the AutoRune “brand” that they trusted. Kaitnieks is a trustworthy person, so logically why would he pass on AutoRune to a scammer? Then AutoRune also had this reputation as an uberbot, and maybe it did deserve it (I’ve never seen a java bot do a decent trade slave script like Kaitnieks did), but honestly by 201 you could C&P a java bot that would do pretty much everything - scriptability being the holy grail feature that no one would teach.[/quote]

I dont think Kait sold it directly to RAW. He sold it to someone else whom he didnt think was a scammer, then he in turn sold it to raw. I read it on Kait’s site :).

Read full topic

item.title: What should i do?
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

ruler:

mopar the admins of the community before you were corrupt but to different degrees. everyone has a price.

Before DoS warz became the cool way of dealing with rival communities, scams were the standard. Eveyone did it - cracking admin accounts, stealing characters, releasing keylogged bots, registering 10k accounts with a forumfucker script…you must understand how immature everyone was when RSC cheating hit its last boom (with version 201).

In the case of Josh: if you were in with TARC, you were safe and probably got stuff for free (if you were really top-level - like Alex, whose forum name I can’t remember). Anyone else got fucked regularly.
e.g., “Oh, I’m sorry, the database dropped the accounts table…again…but mysteriously preserved the free permanent accounts that I give out to friends.”

As far as why people trusted him, I think it was mostly the AutoRune “brand” that they trusted. Kaitnieks is a trustworthy person, so logically why would he pass on AutoRune to a scammer? Then AutoRune also had this reputation as an uberbot, and maybe it did deserve it (I’ve never seen a java bot do a decent trade slave script like Kaitnieks did), but honestly by 201 you could C&P a java bot that would do pretty much everything - scriptability being the holy grail feature that no one would teach.

item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I know that there isn’t much legally we can do with RaW, besides maybe getting the police to bug him a little bit. One thing that I can and will do though is make sure his website never stays up.

item.title: What should i do?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

I don’t see what legal actions you think you can take against raw - he has commited minor fraud, but a lot of us here are guilty of IP theft and probably more anyway, who is going to take a criminals word against a criminal?

Even if you could take legal action against him, he will not get in any trouble. I don’t know how much he’s stolen over the years, but it’s definately not a large enough number to get him any sentence other than having to pay the money back (which is not a problem for him, he has a lot of the green stuff, the fucking rich kid ;)).

Not that I am advocating what he does, but all you can really do is rest comfortably knowing that you will not fall for his con-artistry and that anyone who does will learn from their mistake soon enough.

Read full topic

item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

kmb:

If someone would like to get back to Josh, maybe some good writer (like PaulT) could write a touching story about Josh’s scams and send it to his girlfriend. Maybe we should make a thread where people can submit their experiences with him. I’m not sure if Josh’s girlfirend, Dana I think her name was, cares but you could try…

Thats a pretty good idea if someone could do it in the general section, that way at least everyone who read it would not trust RaW, that may save a few people from being scammed again.
